text: Rambling Rose is a 1991 American drama movie. The movie is set in Georgia during the Great Depression. It stars Laura Dern as the title character. Robert Duvall, Diane Ladd and Lukas Haas play the family she moves in with. It was released in September 1991 in the United States. == Other websites == * Category:1991 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:English- language movies Category:Movies about sexuality Category:Movies about puberty Category:Movies set in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies directed by Martha Coolidge
title: Rambling Rose
